history.proof: intros H1 H2. apply vrf_pre with (i := i). - intro H3. shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment this : nid W : world A : Type p : Pred state q : A -> Pred state i : state e : DHT[this,W](p,q) k : cont A H1 : i \\In Coh W -> p i H2 : forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \\In Coh W -> k x m Unable to unify "k ?M1570 ?M1571" with "exists n : nat, network_rely' W this n i i".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
p: Pred state
q: A -> Pred state
i: state
e: DHT[this,W](p,q)
k: cont A

Goal:
(i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
with_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), DTbin this W s -> DT this W A
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
nid = nat : Set
call_rule' : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
vrf_post : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => forall m' : state, network_rely W this m m' -> k x m')
bind_rule : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (q : cont A) (r : cont B), verify i e1 q -> (forall (y : A) (j : state), q y j -> j \In Coh W -> verify j (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
step : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (r : cont B), verify i e1 (fun (y : A) (m : state) => verify m (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
vrf_coh : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
binarify = fun (A : Type) (p : pre) (q : cont A) => (p, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => p i -> q y m) : forall A : Type, pre -> cont A -> spec A Arguments binarify {A}%type_scope
alw_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : state -> proc this (mkWorld pr) A -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ ((exists q' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))
vrf_pre : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i i' : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
aft_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : A -> state -> Prop), (forall (v : A) (s0 : state), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 v s0 -> P2 v s0) -> after s p P1 -> after s p P2
aft_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : B -> state -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> after s1 p1 (fun (v : A) (s : state) => forall p : proc this W B, p \In pp2 v -> after s p P) -> after s1 p12 P
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
alw_imp' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
alw_step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
bind_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B), bnd_prog (code_of e1) (fun x : A => let y := e2 x in code_of y) \In has_spec this W (bind_s e1 e2)
DT_rec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Set), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rect : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Type), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_ind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Prop), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
coh_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (s : state), s \In Coh (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> s \In Coh U
alw_refl : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup

``` 
intros H1 H2.
apply vrf_pre with (i := i).
- intro H3. apply H1. assumption.
- intros x m H4 H5. apply H2; assumption.
```

original: intros H1 H2. apply vrf_pre with (i := i). - intro H3. apply H1. auto. - intros x m H4 H5. apply H2; auto.
